Dialogue:
DG: Good evening.
BA: Good evening!
DG: Did the typhoon affect you yesterday?
BA: I was okay! How about you?
DG: It was okay. After the rain stopped, the cicadas got really loud.
BA: Noted.
DG: It's so noisy!
BA: Yes, it is noisy.
DG: This month has gone by so quickly.
BA: Yes, it has. Did you do anything summery?
DG: No, I've been staying home a lot. Did you go anywhere?
BA: I went to the sea and the pool.
DG: That's nice. Did you get a tan?
BA: Yes, it's noticeable.
DG: I get red easily. I'm envious.
BA: Understood.
DG: Yes, but the sunlight is really strong this year.
BA: Are you using UV protection?
DG: I am, but I'm not sure how effective it is.
BA: Understood.
DG: Yes, I got a little tan.
BA: It's hard to avoid.
DG: Yes, I admire tanned skin.
BA: It might cause skin spots.
DG: I already have spots on my arm.
BA: Can people who blush also get spots?
DG: I turn red briefly and then stay that way without noticing.
BA: That sounds unpleasant.
DG: I need to be careful. Thank you.
BA: Thank you.

DG: Nice to meet you.
BA: Nice to meet you.
DG: Is there anything you've been into recently?
BA: Can you tell me who you are?
DG: Maybe things like watching movies.
BA: I enjoy that too! What have you watched recently?
DG: I watched the new One Piece release.
BA: Do you also watch anime?
DG: Yes, but at home, we watch a lot of Western movies.
BA: I also enjoy Western movies.
DG: Do you have any favorite works or actors?
BA: I like Ryan Gosling.
DG: What movies has he been in? My memory is not clear.
BA: He was in 'The Notebook'.
DG: Oh, is he also from 'La La Land'?
BA: Yes, that's correct.
DG: He's a great actor. I also liked him in 'Blade Runner 2049'.
BA: That's nice! Who is your favorite actor?
DG: Johnny Depp from the past.
BA: When did that movie air?
DG: I like 'Chocolat'.
BA: Is he not as good recently?
DG: It's not that he's bad, but I preferred when he worked with Tim Burton.
BA: I understand.
DG: Recently, there haven't been many interesting new releases, so I watch mostly on Prime.
BA: I use Netflix.
DG: Netflix originals have increased!
BA: Yes, they have increased a lot. It's hard to keep up.
DG: That's true. It's a convenient world.
BA: It certainly is.
